title: I Canâ€™t Tell You Why [Hell Freezes Over]
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Timothy B. Schmidt]
Look at us, baby, up all night
Tearing our love apart
Aren't we the same two people who live
Through years in the dark?
Ahh-ah
[Chorus: Timothy B. Schmidt]
Every time I try to walk away
Something makes me turn around and stay
And I can't tell you why
[Verse 2: Timothy B. Schmidt]
When we get crazy, it just ain't right (Try to keep your head, little girl)
Girl, I get lonely, too
You don't have to worry, just hold on tight (Don't get caught in your little world)
'Cause I love you
[Chorus: Timothy B. Schmidt]
Nothing's wrong as far as I can see
We make it harder than it has to be
And I can't tell you why
No, baby, I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why
[Bridge]
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)

[Chorus: Timothy B. Schmidt]
Every time I try to walk away
Something makes me turn around and stay
And I can't tell you why
No, no, baby, I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why
I can't tell you why
No
[Spoken]
Thank you
